languages.text: "Абеляр, немедленно объясни этому человеку, как он должен ко мне обращаться".
"Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."
languages.original_text: "Абеляр, немедленно объясни этому человеку, как он должен ко мне обращаться".

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."
"Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."
"Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."
"Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."
"Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

languages.text: "Abelard, erklärt diesem Mann augenblicklich, wie er mich anzusprechen hat."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, erklärt diesem Mann augenblicklich, wie er mich anzusprechen hat."

languages.text: « Abélard, expliquez à cet homme comment il doit s'adresser à moi. »
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: « Abélard, expliquez à cet homme comment il doit s'adresser à moi. »

languages.text: “阿贝拉德，和这个人解释一下他该怎么称呼我。”
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: “阿贝拉德，和这个人解释一下他该怎么称呼我。”

languages.text: «Abelard, explique a este hombre cómo debe dirigirse a mí».
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: «Abelard, explique a este hombre cómo debe dirigirse a mí».

languages.text: 「アベラルド、この男に、{mf|俺|私}への話し方をすぐに教えてやってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: 「アベラルド、この男に、{mf|俺|私}への話し方をすぐに教えてやってくれ」

languages.text: "Abelard, bu adama bana nasıl hitap edeceğini açıkla."
languages.original_text: "Abelard, explain to this man at once how he will address me."

traits.locale_text: "Abelard, bu adama bana nasıl hitap edeceğini açıkla."
